{{Infobox Berry |name = Passho |image = [[File:Passho.png]] |caption = This Berry's flesh is dotted with countless tiny bubbles of air that keep it afloat in water. This Berry promotes the fruiting of nearby Berry plants. |growtime =6h 0m 0s |harvest = 22 berries |replant = 5% |points = 1,300 |flavor =
*0 spicy *15 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Passho''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Oran]], at least 1 [[Chesto]], at least 1 [[Kelpsy]] and at least 1 [[Coba]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 8 mins 10 secs || 1 hour || 3 hours || 6 hours 12 hours |- ! Animation |
